Rulings.Cat:
● 'Blue Thunder T-45's' effect activates at the end of the Damage Step, when monsters that are destroyed by battle are sent to the GY. If the monster destroyed in battle by 'Blue Thunder T-45' is removed from play by 'Dimensional Fissure', etc., 'Blue Thunder T-45's' effect still activates.
● If 'Blue Thunder T-45' is destroyed by a card effect after damage calculation, its effect still activates.
● Even while 'Skill Drain' is applying, the 'Thunder Option Token' can't be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.
